Aver.definition: to assert or declare positively esp. in a pleading
Aver.origin: [not necessary to the capacity of a party to sue " Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 9(a)"]

aver·ring.definition: to assert or declare positively esp. in a pleading[not necessary to the capacity of a party to sue "Rule 9(a)"]
aver·ring.note: Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 8(e)(1) requires that averments in a pleading be “simple, concise, and direct,” and states that “no technical forms of pleading or motions are required.”
